name: places/ChIJ8eOePAb2wokRy558n8OYEt8
adrFormatAddress: 2119 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10029-2178, USA

originalText.text:
This place has the BEST Mexican stuff, I haven’t been able to find better panela and Oaxaca cheese anywhere else.

Nopales, cilantro and pápalo are fresh, they have a wide variety of tortillas (yellow and blue corn), chicken is clean and fresh, they have the friendliest staff AND a beautiful cat, Príncipe, that loves to greet customers.

I recently moved to a different neighborhood but I still plan my shopping day to come here.

originalText.text: Picture speaks for it self .. OLD MEAT ! YOU CAN LITERALLY SEE THE CANCER HOLES ++ they didn’t refund me ..

text.text: Picture speaks for it self .. OLD MEAT ! YOU CAN LITERALLY SEE THE CANCER HOLES ++ they didn’t refund me ..

originalText.text:
This is small bit mighty market. I can tell you that it's not a huge variety of meats however what prompted me to write this review is:
1. Customer Service is a 10
2. Freshness of the meat, AMAZING
3. THE GROUND BEEF!!!

Although it's sold widely the ground meat here is a bit more expensive than others in the area. The difference is that it's fresh ground. I've never had it before and didn't know exactly what it means but it was sublime in my very common meat loaf dinner. Give them a try.

originalText.text: Some Mexican comidas you cannot find anywhere else in NYC; some that you can, but are fresher and more reliably available here.  Several varieties of field corn for masa sold; dried chiles fresh, cheap and in abundance; fresh, properly-raised poultry; real mexican chorizo and longaniza; butcher’s manteca; nopales with the needles trimmed for your convenience (!). Friendly helpful staff.  All manner of dry and canned goods.  Produce not their specialty, but there’s a greengrocer across 3rd av that has everything you’d want.

originalText.text: I had the worst experience in this store. My mother was disrespect by the cashier. NEVER AGAIN ! I would like to speak to the manager. Cant believe this. I would rate this store a zero if I could.
